dict.string: Setup your phone to use M-Pin
Create an identity
Enter your email address to register.
Setup your phone to use M-Pin
Confirm your email
Click the link in the email and you are ready to choose your PIN.
Setup your phone to use M-Pin
Create your PIN
It's much simpler than a password and more secure.
Setup your phone to use M-Pin
You are ready to go!
You can now use your M-Pin identity any time you want.
Get your own M-Pin Server
Download and setup your own M-Pin Server
Visit certivox.com/products, choose from M-Pin Core or M-Pin SSO, then follow the online installation instructions.
Get your own M-Pin Server
Add your server to this app
Simply hit “+” on the next screen then enter the name and URL of your M-Pin Server and you are ready to authenticate to your service using this app.
Setup your phone to use M-Pin
Create an identity
Enter your email address to register.
Setup your phone to use M-Pin
Confirm your email
Click the link in the email and you are ready to choose your PIN.
Setup your phone to use M-Pin
Create your PIN
It's much simpler than a password and more secure.
Setup your phone to use M-Pin
You are ready to go!
You can now use your M-Pin identity any time you want.
Login to the Certivox community
Get your Access Number
Login to discuss.certivox.com on your desktop browser and choose "Sign in with phone".
Login to the Certivox community
Get your Access Number
Login to discuss.certivox.com on your desktop browser and choose "Sign in with phone".
